document_data.name: Oldturret Farm
document_data.mainbody: '''Oldturret Farm''' was a farm belonging to the [[Klaeverdar]] clan as of the late mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: [[Baerbuckle Klaeverdar]] headed one of the [[Klaeverdar]] branches from that farm; [[Gueladdeth Klaeverdar]], the clan matriarch, dwelt there in {{yearlink|1370}}.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: The farm's namesake was an old keep, supposedly destroyed when a matriarch of a previous generation, [[Jaedreene Klaeverdar]], fought through a whole night with a small army of invaders, the "evil ones out of [[Dragonspear]]".
